short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays the font of an html element on hover.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IdentiFont helps you identify the font-faces used across the web. Simply turn on the extension, and hover over almost any block of text to see a popup containing the name of the font used. Remember to restart your browser after installing.
